name: Ashworld
description: Scavenge, fight, attack, defend, and survive in the Ashworld. Post apocalyptic open-world survival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
